name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Merch Wizard - Merch By Amazon Manager

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Merch Wizard is a Merch By Amazon organizer and sales tool that integrates with Airtable to supercharge Merch.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine your Merch By Amazon account in a spreadsheet you control in the cloud. Combining your listing data, design files and sales for the first time ever. Welcome to MerchWizard. 

Most of us are too busy cranking out designs and listing them to bring in an organised streamlined approach to our work. We have all tried different folder structures, file naming conventions and shared spreadsheets.

Merch Wizard allows you to push 100s of your product listings to your own Airtable spreadsheet. You can drop your PNG files alongside your listing data and see the sales statistics on each listing.

View the quick overview video here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LK9UBUQlnoQ
Setup guide video also available at - https://youtu.be/SQ3T9PZ0a3o

*** Subscribe to the extension on Gumroad at https://gum.co/MerchWizard ***

*** Grab the template Airtable base at https://airtable.com/shrQSusJarXlpnmwd Airtable is like a very powerful spreadsheet in the sky and it's free for up to 1200 designs per base (database). Then you can either create a new base every 1200 designs or upgrade to one of their paid plans.  ***

For more detailed information on MerchWizard please visit https://www.merchwizard.app/

Merch Wizard's Key Features:

✅ Exports ALL of your listing information (brand, title, bullets, description, a thumbnail pic of your design, price, product type, colors, current BSR, number of reviews, average star rating and sales data) to a powerful “spreadsheet” in the cloud called Airtable.
✅ Store your PNG files directly with your listings!
✅ Find out which of your listings have reviews, including their average star rating and current BSR.
✅ Assign niches and tags to your listings - discover your bestselling niches. 
✅ Use our on page Resizer to resize your artwork without having to leave your browser
✅ Translates your listings to multiple marketplaces using Marketplace Migrator
✅ Easily list designs on other product types and markets and re-upload designs that Amazon removed due to no sales.
✅ Creates listing data for scaled designs for super fast uploading.
✅ Keeps track of which PODs you have uploaded to.
✅ Supports all marketplaces (US, UK, DE, FR, IT, ES, JP).
✅ Supports all product types 
✅ Does not require any prior knowledge about Airtable.
✅ Great support team.
✅ Regular updates.


User Reviews

I love this tool! I have an existing Airtable that I use to research/create/develop designs, this is a perfect companion tool for it I prefer to keep them seperate because my design base is shared with my designer and VA, so my sales and listing data is seperate and private.

I also use the data in this base for my advertising, to track reviews and I know it will be great for finding the next TOS violation when/if Merch has changed adopted to its current TOS, as the listing data is pushed directly from my listing so it will always be up to date!

Thanks for a great tool, Rick!!

MARY MASLIAH

September 13th 2018



I seriously can't even express how wonderful and incredible Merch Wizard is. I had been using airtable for quite some time but, it became very difficult to always update my spreadsheet. With the Wizard automating all of that, it has been nothing short of a miracle and easier to manage my listings!

My productivity since getting this tool is been as high as I remember it. All the extra features are wonderful too, but even the base feature for me is a lifesaver. I can't even imagine anyone doing merch above tier 500 not using this! I am seriously very thankful that this tool came out, it may have changed my merch journey!

Thank you to the Merch Wizard!

FLAVIO MEDEIROS

September 30th 2018



Absolutely incredible - this is the tool I have been waiting for!!

In less the time it took to watch the setup video, I literally had every single one of my Merch shirts recorded in Airtable along with ALL of the sales history (# of shirts sold for each listing, reviews, revenue and royalties and much much more.

THIS.IS.GENIUS.

Thank you so much Rick!

JON NEVEU

September 5th 2018



I am loving MerchWizard! Even as an airtable noob, I'm finding MW easy enough to use and put into action right away.

It's the best organizational tool for MBA by far. The scaler tool is awesome and will save me a ton of time in creating and uploading listings.

I can't wait to see what they come up with next, Thank you Rick Blyth and team for making this amazing tool available to us!
